data.title: Eudes Guillaume (Otto William), Count of BURGUNDY
data.text:
Adelaide of BURGUNDY - Eudes Guillaume (Otto William), Count of BURGUNDY

Adelaide of BURGUNDY

Father: Giselbert, Duke of BURGUNDY

Mother: Ermengarde, Heiress of AUTUN

Birth: 0920

Death: 0956/0960

Partnership with: Robert, Count of TROYES

Child: Adelaide of VERMANDOIS Birth: ABT 0950, Vermandois, Normandy, France

Ancestors of Adelaide of BURGUNDY

/-Giselbert, Duke of BURGUNDY Adelaide of BURGUNDY \-Ermengarde, Heiress of AUTUN

Descendants of Adelaide of BURGUNDY

1 Adelaide of BURGUNDY =Robert, Count of TROYES 2 Adelaide of VERMANDOIS =Lambert d' AUTUN Marriage: ABT 0948 3 Maud (Matilda) DE CHALONS =Geoffrey I of SEMUR Marriage: ABT 0967 =Geoffrey I "Grisgonelle", Count of ANJOU Marriage: ABT 0965 3 Ermengarde of ANJOU De Grisegonelle =Conan Le Tort I, Count of RENNES Marriage: 0973 3 Gerberge of ANJOU =Guillaume IV Taillefer, Count of ANGOULEME Marriage: BEF 1000 3 Fulk III the Black, Count of ANJOU =(Unknown) =(Unknown)
